title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your looks and tastes cant be everyones cup of tea, especially at work. You can only accommodate others so far before you give away too much of yourself. Listen to feedback without becoming too dependent or hungry for it. Check within for whether a churlish critique rings true in your own heart. If not, throw it out of your psyche. Thankfully, pursuing your ambitions is independent of anyone elses opinion. Let your work speak for itself. Master motivator Zig Ziglar said, Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
